job.title: Trainee Patent Attorney - Digital (Electronic & Electrical Engineering)

job_description:
LondonFull-Time | Permanent | HybridStart Date: September 2026Join EIP as a Trainee Patent Attorney and transform your passion for electrical engineering into a rewarding career in patents!From day one, you’ll be working directly with clients, gaining real-world experience while being supported by a comprehensive training programme and a team that shares your drive and ambition. You’ll benefit from a clear path to qualification, full support for exams, and the chance to contribute to high-profile cases involving some of the most advanced technologies in the world.About EIP DigitalEIP Digital is at the forefront of innovation, working across a wide range of technologies - from AI and machine learning to electronics, semiconductor technologies, telecoms, optics, and applied physics. Since our founding in 2000, technical excellence has been central to our success.Our team is trusted with high-value, complex matters including licensing, technology standards, pre-litigation analysis, and litigation. Many of our attorneys operate at the intersection of emerging fields such as electronics and health-tech, or AI and drug discovery, making EIP Digital a truly exciting place to grow your career.What We’re Looking ForWe’re seeking bright, motivated individuals with a strong academic background in electrical engineering who are ready to take on the challenge of becoming a patent attorney.You’ll NeedAn impressive Degree, Master’s, or PhD in electrical engineering or related discipline.A genuine interest in technology and innovation.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.The ability to explain complex ideas clearly and concisely.Confidence engaging with people at all levels.A meticulous eye for detail and strong analytical thinking.Initiative and the ability to work independently.An open-minded, accountable and resilient mindset.Strong time management skills.Why EIP?EIP specialises in high-value and complex patent matters, with offices across Europe and the US. Our multidisciplinary team includes patent attorneys, litigators, and commercial IP lawyers working in three of the world’s key patent markets - the UK, Europe, and the USA.At EIP, you’ll be part of a collaborative and open culture that values technical excellence and strategic thinking. We offer a competitive salary alongside a market-leading bonus structure, flexible and hybrid working options, and private healthcare as part of a comprehensive benefits package.Ready to apply?If you're excited to make an impact in the world of patents, we’d love to hear from you.
        


        
            Show more

key_requirements: Impressive Degree, Master’s, or PhD in electrical engineering or related discipline (AI is strongly related).
Genuine interest in technology and innovation.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to explain complex ideas clearly and concisely.
Meticulous eye for detail and strong analytical thinking.
Initiative and ability to work independently.
Experience with AI and machine learning, electronics, semiconductor technologies, telecoms, optics, and applied physics.
job_analysis.selected_projects_reasoning: Selected 'DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System' as it directly showcases practical application of advanced AI/ML models (Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, RAG, vector embeddings) for complex data extraction and analysis, highly aligning with the job's 'AI and machine learning' focus and the need for meticulous detail. 'FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System' further strengthens the AI/ML profile by demonstrating expertise in Generative AI, Stable Diffusion, and performance optimization, reflecting a deep technical understanding. 'Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)' was chosen for its demonstration of complex system architecture, an 'AI-like matching engine' using weighted vectors, asynchronous processing, and robust data modeling, which highlights strong analytical thinking, problem-solving, and the ability to design intricate digital systems relevant to understanding and articulating patents in digital technologies. The generic KanSync project was less relevant for this specific role than these AI/ML and complex system design projects.

tailored_cv.professional_summary: Highly analytical and detail-oriented Artificial Intelligence Master's student with a strong foundation in AI/ML model development, complex system architecture, and data processing. Passionate about technology innovation, adept at translating intricate technical concepts into clear, concise explanations, and skilled in transforming business needs into efficient, scalable solutions. Eager to leverage a meticulous approach and problem-solving abilities to excel in patent analysis and protection within the digital and AI/ML domains, aligning with the core requirements of a Trainee Patent Attorney.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence

other_degrees.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
other_degrees.university: Vivekanand Education Society’s Institute of Technology, Mumbai, India

experience.title: Salesforce Administrator Intern
experience.description: Administered and automated Salesforce CRM, focusing on process optimization and system design.
achievements: Automated Salesforce workflows and validation rules, enhancing CRM data accuracy by 20% and ensuring adherence to complex business logic.
Designed and implemented travel management modules with intuitive dashboards, significantly improving reporting and data visibility.
Collaborated cross-functionally to meticulously translate complex business requirements into scalable, maintainable technical configurations.

experience.title: Technology Foundations Virtual Experience
experience.description: Simulated an end-to-end Agile SDLC, focusing on Python scripting, DevOps, and automation.
achievements: Completed an end-to-end Agile SDLC simulation, gaining practical experience with DevOps principles and automation tools.
Debugged and optimised Python scripts, boosting runtime efficiency by 30% through meticulous code analysis and refactoring.
Presented complex algorithmic solutions using clear flow diagrams, significantly improving technical communication and stakeholder understanding.

projects.title: DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System
projects.description: An AI-powered web application for intelligent medical document management, leveraging advanced AI for OCR, data extraction, and interactive insights.
achievements: Re-architected the backend infrastructure to a 100% free-tier compatible stack using Supabase, demonstrating cost-effective and scalable design.
Developed a robust server-side AI pipeline utilizing Google Gemini 1.5 Flash for precise OCR and sophisticated medical data extraction.
Engineered an intelligent Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chat system using vector embeddings for querying health records, providing accurate and context-aware responses.
Built a high-performance frontend with Next.js 14 App Router and Server Actions for secure data fetching and a seamless user experience.

projects.title: FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System
projects.description: Developed a generative AI model for realistic text-to-image synthesis, demonstrating expertise in advanced deep learning techniques.
achievements: Built a sophisticated generative AI model leveraging Stable Diffusion and LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) for high-fidelity text-to-image generation.
Optimised GPU training on an RTX 3050, achieving a 25% reduction in memory usage through efficient model parameter tuning and batch processing.
Integrated real-time data pipelines to enhance the interactive user experience, showcasing robust data handling and system responsiveness.

projects.title: Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)
projects.description: A comprehensive job aggregation and matching platform tailored for students, featuring an AI-like matching engine and asynchronous data processing.
achievements: Architected a specific matching engine utilizing weighted vectors for precise alignment of location, schedule, and skill requirements, demonstrating advanced algorithmic design.
Engineered asynchronous background worker pipelines with Celery and Redis to efficiently scrape external job boards, ensuring high performance without UI lag.
Designed a highly normalized PostgreSQL schema with SQLAlchemy ORM, enabling complex relationship modeling and efficient data retrieval.
Developed a high-performance reactive frontend using React 19 and React Hook Form, providing a seamless and intuitive user experience.
